name: Dark Fantasy Requiem
description:
Description:

The game was created and submitted for the Metroidvania Month Jam. Dark Fantasy Requiem, originally named "Black and White Odyssey", is a game of the Metroidvania genre, action-adventure platforms, with a theme of dark fantasy and the dreamworld. Its beginning in the development comes from Black and White Odyssey and in each drastic change in game polish that is had in the update in its development the name is changed. Then it became "Happy Ending", passing through "Dark Secrets in Shadowlands" and now in its final version it is called "Dark Fantasy Requiem". And now it's in its final stages where you just need to add a few details.

Story:

Warrior Kaley and her faithful Murciecat companion venture into the decaying lands of Niria to defeat the Lord of Nightmares. Kobeth-Mo, has materialized in the real world and has dominated the entire system planetary of Niria turning it into the now called Shadowlands. Kaley and Murciecat have to defeat the Lord of Nightmares if they want to survive and thus return everything to normal.

Controls (Keyboard):

A / D - Lateral Movement

E - Action Button

W - Open doors

S - Go down platforms

SPACE - Jump

SHIFT - Dash

Right Click - Item Attack

Left Click - Move Camera

ESC - Map

ESC (Hold) - Exit

Z / C or Mouse Wheel - Change Items

ENTER - Pause

Q (Hold) - Fast Travel

Alt - Shield

X (Hold) - Heal

R (Hold) - Instakill

F  - Sword

Controls (Gamepad):

↔ (Left Stick) - Lateral Movement

B - Action Button

↑ (Left Stick) - Open doors

↓ (Left Stick) - Go down platforms

A / LT - Jump

RB - Dash

X / RT - Attack Item

(Right Stick) - Move Camera

Back - Map

Back (Hold) - Exit

↔ (D-Pad) - Change Items

Start - Pause

Start (Hold) -  Instakill

LB - Shield

Y (Hold) - Heal

↑  (Gamepad Hold) - Fast Travel

↓  (Gamepad) - Sword
